english: Fee-charging Standards for the National Museum of Prehistory
title: 國立臺灣史前文化博物館規費收費標準
history: Promulgated and enacted by NMP Order Mi-Zi No. 0940004072 on Nov. 30, 2005
Revised by NMP Order Mi-Zi No. 1000003966 on Oct. 6, 2011
Revised by NMP Order Mi-Zi No. 10230014751 on Jan. 2, 2014
Revised by NMP Order Mi-Zi No. 10430005101 on May. 6, 2015

articles.content: The Standards are stipulated in accordance with Paragraph 1, Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.
Admission prices to the exhibition galleries of the National Museum of Prehistory (referred to as “the Museum” hereinafter) are as shown in Attached Table 1.

As its operations permit, the Museum shall provide its venues for use by foreign and domestic public and private organizations or individuals for the holding of non-profit or social educational events that conform with the operational objectives of the Museum. Fee-charging standards for the use of venues are as shown in Attached Table 2.
Fee-charging standards for the use of the Museum’s pianos are as shown in Attached Table 3.
Fee-charging standards for the use of the Museum’s image materials and photocopy charges are as shown in Attached Table 4.
Admission prices to the exhibition room of the visitor’s center of the Museum’s Peinan Cultural Park are as shown in Attached Table 5.
Venue and facility management fees for the Museum’s Peinan Cultural Park are as shown in Attached Table 6.
Museum-issued “Family Card” discount ticket prices are as shown in Attached Table 7.

Fee-charging standards prescribed here shall be reviewed at least once every three years to take into consideration various factors, such as prices of commodities and changes in market prices or costs.
The Standards shall take effect immediately upon promulgation.
